text:
@GOP @realDonaldTrump Please vote for @JoeBiden 

It is now crystal clear that Trump and his administration do not value American lives and have failed the U.S. Their failure to respond to Covid-19 with a national plan has cost American lives and destroyed our economy. @SpeakerPelosi @CNN @AP @ABC @VP
